text:
アナボについては40曲ほど未交換あり。
チャレライは推し以外ほとんどやってません。
キャラランについては全キャラ60↑です。
全キャラのマスランスキレベを純結晶換算すると700個↑使ってます。
課金額は数えてないのでわかりません。 出品金額の倍以上はしてるとおもいます。
買う人いるならどうぞぐらいのスタンスなので値下げなどは一切考えてません。
トラブルだるいので即購入はおやめください。
trans:
There are about 40 unredeemed songs in Anabo.
For Challenge Live, I have barely touched anything outside of my favorites.
As for character ranks, all characters are at 60 or above.
Converting all character master ranks and skill levels to pure crystals, I have used over 700 of them.
I don't know the exact amount I have spent on this game since I have not been tracking, but I assume it is well over double the listed price.
If someone wants to buy it, please do so, but I am not considering any price reductions.
Please refrain from instant purchases to avoid any unnecessary trouble.
